lead_paragraph: Chief Charlie Beck of the Los Angeles police said Wednesday that he had yet to see evidence to justify the fatal shooting of an unarmed homeless man by one of his officers near Venice Beach.

headline.print_headline: California: Killing by Officer Is Investigated
headline.main: California: Killing by Officer Is Investigated

snippet: Chief Charlie Beck of the Los Angeles police said Wednesday that he had yet to see evidence to justify the fatal shooting of an unarmed homeless man by one of his officers near Venice Beach.
abstract: Los Angeles Police Chief Charlie Beck expresses serious concern over shooting of homeless man by officer near Venice Beach, saying he has yet to see evidence justifying shooting; incident is under investigation.
